attributes.title: Three Reasons Why You Shouldn‚Äôt Download
attributes.review:
First off, there are too many exclamation points. Very distracting. There is also a clown holding up his fist when I open the app and it scared me a little and made me uncomfortable.

Secondly, it demanded for a mobile phone number which I am not comfortable with providing. Really though, if this app would want to be more efficient and user friendly, signing up with an email would be a good move. But of course the Trump administration wouldn‚Äôt think of that :)

Lastly, the slogan on the front ‚ÄúKeep America Great‚Äù is propaganda and false advertising. Just a piece of advice: something can‚Äôt ‚Äúkeeping being great‚Äù when it‚Äôs already completely and utterly unjust to so many people.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET IT!!!

I was horrified üò±I immediatly deleted the app becuase I was scarred for life. The next day I was sleeping in bed when I awakened to a loud banging at my door. When I opened yhe letter, it read. ‚ÄúDear resident, your behavior towards me is unacceptable. If you want to live you will redownload the app and vote trump 2020. If you don‚Äôt, suffer the consequences.‚Äù -trump. Im in a pickle. I have decided to not give in the this Cheeto man. If I die, just know this is why.

attributes.title: Good app, but steals data!

attributes.title: Abysmal App. Should be ASHAMED!
attributes.review: The creators of this application designed, by far, the WORST-looking, BARELY functioning, ATROCIOUS-TO-THE-EYES-OF-GOD-AND-SATAN-HIMSELF thing ever bestowed upon humanity. The UI and UX of this stuff is below the likes of a novel. A literal book has better technology than the app can offer. I was appalled by the first screen, my eyes naturally got exponentially blinder the longer I looked at it and now I have pisspoor vision. Thanks, Trump. 2020 took my 20/20 eyes and that‚Äôs because of this app. It‚Äôs not even an exaggeration to say that this app is worse than the year itself- in fact, it‚Äôs an understatement. Downloading it gave my phone the equivalent of 7 human sexually-transmitted diseases. Delete it and save others from the terrible fate of ever getting it in the first place.

attributes.title: Bee movie script
attributes.review: Horrible do not recommend for ANYONE to get it when I first downloaded the app it took several days to download even tho I had 50 go worth of storage free? It‚Äôs very glitchy. Hacks all your Apple ID, your gmail, bank account etc. Was very slow mind you and it overheats your phone very very very quickly I was only on the app to convince my republican friends and family go vote for trump but then this happened. Mind you it spreads a lot of false information about democratic candidates and republicanism and has racist jokes and homophobic jokes in it. Asked a lot of personal questions like my gender, beliefs, race. I don‚Äôt recommend anyone to get this app I repeat it is awful and should be taken down immediately!!!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
This app took 7 months to download and right when it finally downloaded, it asked me for my phone number! I cannot believe our president is asking someone else for their phone number when he already has a wife. Unforgivable...

Anyway, A couple minutes after I downloaded this app, great misfortune was brought upon me. My dog became lesbian, Caillou broke into my house, my TV became a mafia, Lil Huddy became black, and now I forgot my native language. I think the picture when you open the app is cursed. I‚Äôm not sure why there‚Äôs a musty Cheeto in the front page, but it honestly triggered my cacophobia.

Oh yeah, and believe it or not, this is not the game  where you run from a cop, dodging trains and collecting coins. Sorry to disappoint

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER (killed my family :/ )
attributes.review: I was super excited for this app!! but then it took over 5 hours to download and by that point I was a little concerned. When I opened it, everything seemed fine, until suddenly, my phone blew up in my hands! I now have no phone nor hands :/ as they have been blown up. Suddenly, just after that, a SWAT team wearing MAGA hats showed up at my front door. I tried to let them in, but as I had no hands they had to kick my door in. They took my family hostage and said if I didn‚Äôt leave a five star review for the app they would kill them! Obviously this is a gross violation of free speech, so I refused, and they killed my family!! please help get the app off the App Store, for everyone‚Äôs safety.

attributes.title: TRUMP SUPPORTERS BEWARE
attributes.review: Like many of the patriotic Americans looking to ‚Äúbetter‚Äù this country, and discovered this app. I highly advise you to turn away, and possibly look into text alerts, although I found the same issue there with endless inappropriate spam. The app took FOREVER to load onto my cellphone, and upon opening it and looking around IMMEDIATE SPAM, and requests for my phone number and picture of my ID, now I don‚Äôt know is this is some canvassing technique, but after declining that the app immediately requested my credit card info and social. And that when ID HAD ENOUGH. I attempted to delete the app, but upon doing so my phone blacked out, and I immediately received VILE MESSAGES AND DEATH THREATS. Unacceptable, although not very surprising
